Topic.Title: NarraScope 2019 -- an interactive fiction conference in Boston

Posts.EditableText:
NarraScope, an IF conference planned for June 2019 in Boston, has been announced at the intfiction.org forum: https://www.intfiction.org/forum/viewtopic.php?f=4&t=26611

NarraScope website: http://narrascope.org/

(I am not involved with planning this conference--I am just spreading the word.)
